GUIDES
BUILD WITH IT: DIAMOND!与之搭建：钻石！
Get ready to give your designs a glow-up in this week’s Build with It! We asked for your creative community ideas recently, and everyone came through in a flash with designs ready to dazzle and impress (like our top image from IvanZagoro). That’s right – we’re talking about diamond builds today!准备好在本周的与之搭建栏目给您的作品一个大大的赞！近期我们向社区征求创意灵感，大家都开始摩拳擦掌，准备用作品让人耳目一新（就如我们置顶的这张来自IvanZagoro的图片）没错--今天我们来讨论下钻石建筑！
Although diamonds have many real world uses due to their extreme hardness, durability, and luster, you won’t find them used in buildings or clever creations like we’re suggesting here. Instead, they’re used in drills, semiconductors, record needles, and jewelry. They also have a long and rich history you may be interested in checking out.虽然现实世界中钻石以高硬度、耐久和光泽而具有多种用途，但它们绝不会像我们这里一样被用在建筑和发明上。它们被广泛应用于钻头、半导体、记录针【1】及珠宝上。它们同时也有着漫长而丰富的历史，您若感兴趣可以去浏览下。
In Minecraft, however, they also make a great building material since they’re so tough. In addition to all the tools and armor you can make of them, they also add a lovely aqua shade to your stone and wood designs.但在MC中，它们何其坚固，因而成为一种出色的建筑材料。除了能做成你能用它们做出来的任何工具护甲以外，它们还能给您的木石建筑【2】增添一种美妙的流动感。
There are plenty of places to go looking if you’re short on diamonds! You can mine them in caverns, or set your sights on the numerous chests scattered around the world – shipwrecks, minecarts in abandoned mineshafts, strongholds, jungle temples, buried treasure chests, woodland mansions, and more. Even village chests can potentially hold these glittery gems.如果您缺少钻石的话，可供寻找的地方有很多！您可以在大洞穴中挖到它们，也可以去寻找众多散落于世界各地的宝箱--诸如沉船、废弃矿洞里的矿车、要塞、丛林神庙、埋藏宝箱、林地府邸等等，任君选择。就连村庄宝箱都有可能拥有这些闪亮的宝石。
Once you have enough diamonds for a whole building, or maybe just a fancy statue, get ready to turn them into your new best (building) friend with some inspiration from the community featured here.当你有足够的钻石去建造建筑（或者只是一尊华丽的雕像）的时候，来这里汲取下来自社区的灵感，然后让钻石成为你的新朋友【3】！


Goldrobin presents us with a diamond-accented structure in the middle of a field.Goldrobin为我们展示了一个田野上的钻石风格建筑。





Community builder IvanZagoro thought it was a good idea to use diamond in both pillar decorations and statues. We wouldn't go so far and call it “good” – more like "excellent"!社区建筑师IvanZagoro认为将钻石用于装饰两侧支柱和雕像是个不错的主意。我们不会说它“很棒”--应该说“太棒了”！

Next, let’s build with the hottest new materials in the Nether! We’re looking for your coolest Nether portals to share. Want to inspire the rest of the community with your creations? Just email FeatureMe@minecraft.net with screenshots of your creation and some info about what you’ve created – or tweet at us with #FeatureMeMinecraft. If you’re lucky, you may just see your build featured in an upcoming article.接下来，让我们用下界中最烫的【4】新材料来建筑吧！期待您分享最炫酷的下界传送门。想用您的作品启发社区中的其他社友？将您的作品截图，连带您作品的相关信息一并email至FeatureMe@minecraft.net--或者通过发推至#FeatureMeMinecraft通知我们。如果您足够幸运，您将会在下期栏目看到您的作品。




备注：【1】又称唱头、留声机针，留声机重要组成部件，其材质为人造金刚石。【2】专指以原木、木板和鹅卵石为主要材料建造的房屋建筑。【3】此段落为本土化英语表述，作者想表达的意思是“你将会喜欢钻石建筑的”。【4】一语双关，最烫的=最火的。
